siteMetadata.title: VideoTranslatorAI
siteMetadata.description: Video Translator provides a real time AI transcription, translation and dubbing. Transform your text, image, audio and video content with support for 120+ languages.
siteMetadata.keywords: video translation,video translator,caption maker,closed captioning software,open captioning software,add captions to video,video captions,subtitle maker,subtitles for video,embed subtitles in video,subtitles video,ai transcription,ai translation,ai dubbing,ai reader,

nodes.title: VideoTranslatorAI at the 2024 NSW Commercialisation Showcase
nodes.description: Join VideoTranslatorAI as we showcase cutting-edge tech at the 2024 NSW Commercialisation Showcase, celebrating innovation and collaboration in NSW!
nodes.coverAlt: VideoTranslatorAI at the 2024 NSW Commercialisation Showcase

nodes.title: Our Trusted Lingo Poster Was Accepted At AFAC '23!
nodes.description: Our poster on Project Trusted Lingo was accepted at the AFAC Conference. Learn more about our work and say hello to Mel Taylor at the event!
nodes.coverAlt: Our Trusted Lingo Poster Was Accepted At AFAC '23!

nodes.title: Bridging Languages, Unleashing Global Potential: Introducing Our New Website and App
nodes.description: Discover our website and app, with native multilingual support and powerful transcription, translation, and voiceover capabilities in 120 languages.
nodes.coverAlt: Bridging Languages, Unleashing Global Potential: Introducing Our New Website and App

nodes.title: Inclusive and Effective: The Power of Local Information Champions in Emergency Services
nodes.description: Discover how local information champions empower CALD communities by facilitating translated emergency communications for effective crisis response.
nodes.coverAlt: Inclusive and Effective: The Power of Local Information Champions in Emergency Services

nodes.title: Embracing Resilience: Our Journey with the Bushfire Commercialisation Fund
nodes.description: Our journey with the Bushfire Commercialisation Fund, the power of positive feedback, and our next steps. #bushfiremitigation #resilience
nodes.coverAlt: Embracing Resilience: Our Journey With the Forest Fire Commercialization Fund

nodes.title: Trusted Lingo – A New Approach To CALD Communications
nodes.description: This blog post discusses a solution called "Trusted Lingo," an AI-based system that translates emergency broadcasts into over 20 languages in real-time.
nodes.coverAlt: Lingo Tepercaya – Pendekatan Baru Untuk Komunikasi CALD
